body_html:
Status hasn't moved on much. I didn't want to downgrade and installing more than one gcc at once seemed a bit of a pain so I tried the nvidia docker approach. Which when installed via the distros package manager deletes things like the dockerd/daemon.json which took me down another rabbit hole...

I'm going to give it a proper stab today and hopefully will have something to report back (hopefully success).

body:
Status hasn't moved on much. I didn't want to downgrade and installing more than one gcc at once seemed a bit of a pain so I tried the nvidia docker approach. Which when installed via the distros package manager deletes things like the dockerd/daemon.json which took me down another rabbit hole...

I'm going to give it a proper stab today and hopefully will have something to report back (hopefully success).
